lines.text: We have lived in peace so long, we've neglected the possiblity of evil and we may have forgotten how to fight it.
My quest began with a riddle. 'In a thousand years, Gandahar was destroyed, and and all its people massacred. A thousand years ago, Gandahar will be saved, and what can't be avoided will be.

[half-conscious]
No, don't turn me to stone... don't steal my body... don't steal my body...

[mischievously]
I don't steal, but I might borrow.
Now then, do you really believe we're the enemy?
Sylvain, can't you guess who we are?
Don't you *know* who we are? We with these bodies, these heads, these limbs, shaped all ways, unassembled without care? C'mon, Sylvain.
